SELECT T.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEMPLATE T1 JOIN CHALLENGE C ON C.TEMPLATE_NO = T1.TEMPLATE_NO JOIN CHALLENGE_USER CU USING (CHALLENGE_NO) WHERE CU.STATUS = 'PLAY' AND T.TEMPLATE_NO = T1.TEMPLATE_NO) as PLAY_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEMPLATE T2 JOIN CHALLENGE C ON C.TEMPLATE_NO = T2.TEMPLATE_NO JOIN CHALLENGE_USER CU USING (CHALLENGE_NO) WHERE CU.STATUS = 'CLEAR' AND T.TEMPLATE_NO = T2.TEMPLATE_NO) as CLEAR_COUNT, P.*, up.*, tc.* FROM TEMPLATE T JOIN TEMPLATE_CATEGORY tc USING (CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE up ON T.TP_CREATER = up.USER_NO LEFT JOIN PHOTO P ON UP.PHOTO_NO = P.PHOTO_NO WHERE T.SAVE_STATUS = 1 AND T.TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo} ORDER BY T.CREATED_AT DESC
